backend/main.mo: Defines authorization, user profiles, visa records, and application status types with in-memory stores and access-controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking UI features to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for build or documentation reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining color tokens and light/dark mode design system.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, routing, and conditional rendering of pages.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Error boundary component that displays a fallback UI and logs errors when child components fail.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper with header, footer, and main content region.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component showing copyright text and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, authentication controls, and user avatar display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: UI component for adding, removing, and listing preset or custom reminder timestamps for a visa expiry date.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Upcomi: Fetches upcoming reminders, computes overdue and days-until values, and displays them in a sorted alert list.
frontend/src/components/status/Applicati: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of application status entries with optional PDF attachment handling.
frontend/src/components/status/PdfAttach: Displays an attached PDF with preview, view, and download options, or shows a no-attachment message.
frontend/src/components/visa/VisaRecordF: Form dialog for creating or editing visa records including details and reminders, with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/visa/VisaRecordL: Lists all visa records with expiry indicators and actions for editing or deleting entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Wraps useActor to expose initialization, readiness, and error states for UI gating and debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlobObjectUrl.ts: Generates and manages a Blob URL from binary data, cleaning it up on unmount or changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Implements simple hash‑based routing between 'home' and 'visa-check' with state syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with user profiles, visa records, reminders, and application‑status checks via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AustralianVisaCheckPa: UI for checking visa application status with actor readiness checks, server mutations, and optional PDF preview.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying visa records, reminders, and application‑status tools with a form for adding or editing records.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page UI with hero section, feature cards, login button, and navigation to visa-check route.
frontend/src/utils/applicationStatusNorm: Provides helpers to normalize applicationId and applicantEmail for consistent backend lookups.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utilities to unwrap Candid option formats and normalize bytes and string values.
frontend/src/utils/getApplicationStatusR: Transforms raw backend application status responses into a normalized ApplicationStatus object, including attachment cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/pdfAttachment.ts: Browser utilities for opening, downloading, and generating Blob URLs for PDF attachments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, known issues, and feature requests for PDF handling in approval flows.
